thread.title: First Draft: Verbatim: When Bernie Sanders Portrays Larry David
thread.title_full: First Draft: Verbatim: When Bernie Sanders Portrays Larry David

author: FIRST DRAFT
title: First Draft: Verbatim: When Bernie Sanders Portrays Larry David
text:
9:37 am ET First Draft We’re going to have to do something that’s pretty hard. Pretty, pretty, pretty hard, to quote Larry David.” — Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont, quoting from one of his “Saturday Night Live” doppelgänger’s most well-known comedic lines, at the Democratic National Committee’s Women’s Leadership Forum on Friday. Thu. Oct. 22 15 Posts About First Draft
